info.author: Andres Baravalle
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
pyGrabComics is part of GNU phpGrabComics.
pyGrabComics provides a set of methods to connect to a phpGrabComics site,
read and parse an xml comic index and download your favourite comics.
It can be used from the command line or imported as module.
On posix environments running Gnome it can display a small icon
in the task notification area that allows easy access to the functions.
info.name: pygrabcomics
info.html_description: pyGrabComics is part of GNU phpGrabComics. pyGrabComics provides a set of methods to connect to a phpGrabComics site, read and parse an xml comic index and download your favourite comics. It can be used from the command line or imported as module. On posix environments running Gnome it can display a small icon in the task notification area that allows easy access to the functions.
